HERO.NAME: Christian Delgado
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Graduated in Systems Engineering with experience in designing, developing, and managing systems, databases, and web applications. I am passionate about creating innovative technological solutions, integrating creativity, efficiency, and best practices to generate scalable and high-performance projects.

SKILLS_INFO.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS_INFO.SUBTITLE: Here are my technical and interpersonal skills, highlighting my experience in developing solutions and effective collaboration in the workplace.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Featured Projects
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: Explore some of my most relevant projects that reflect my skills and experience.

TEXT.PARAGRAPH: My name is Christian Delgado. I started in the world of programming when I was young, beginning my journey with an old computer I had in my room. Curiosity about the systems and websites around me led me to study Systems Engineering, where I developed the ability to solve problems and create innovative solutions.

Throughout my career, I have worked in both corporate environments and freelance projects for international companies and clients remotely, gaining experience in backend and full-stack technologies. My focus has been on performance optimization, platform scalability, and continuous improvement of development processes.

Today, I continue with the same passion for learning and constantly evolving. My goal is to leave a mark in the programming world, as well as in every project I participate in, contributing not only my knowledge and skills but also my principles and values, such as responsibility and dedication to doing what I love most, which is development and programming.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Let's be amazing
CONTACT.PARAGRAPH: As a developer, my passion for programming and my motivation to face new challenges drive me to grow constantly. EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION_1: I completed my Systems Engineering studies at Universidad Privada Domingo Savio in June 2024, where I gained a solid foundation in software development.
EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION_2: This education has prepared me to adapt and contribute efficiently to technological projects.
RECOGNITIONS: Recognized as the Best Student of the Career in 2021, 2022, and 2023.
Honor Roll and awarded Third Best Student of the Faculty of Engineering in 2023.
Academic Excellence Medal awarded upon completion of my studies in 2024, in recognition of my outstanding academic performance throughout the degree.
